text:
马格努斯垂下眼，金色的璀光在他眼睫间闪烁。 他想看到狼王的手指没入后穴，指骨撑平，用暴力的爱抚把他带上高潮——普通情况下只是一两根原体的手指就已经难以承受，但对方宽大的指节三根并拢，紧贴肠壁。
“……唔！”
水声。
大量的水液随着手的颤动飞溅到柔软的羽毛上，马格努斯几乎是立刻身体抽直，脖颈后仰——对方惯于握剑或持斧的巨手抠弄着他体内细腻敏感的软肉，粗粝的指尖在凸起上反复摩挲。
trans:
Magnus lowered his eyes, golden light flickering between his eyelashes. He wanted to see the Wolf King's fingers sink into his anus, flatten his knuckles, and violently caress him into orgasm - under normal circumstances, just one or two fingers of the Primarch would be unbearable, but his three broad knuckles were close together, rubbing tightly against the intestinal wall.
"...Mmm!"
Water sound.
A large amount of water splashed onto the soft feathers with the trembling of the hand, and Magnus almost immediately straightened his body and tilted his neck back - Wolf King's giant hand, which was used to holding a sword or an axe, dug into the delicate and sensitive soft flesh in his body, and the rough fingertips repeatedly rubbed the bulge.
